title: STAC IGC Item Extension
description: Defines additional Item properties that describe International Gliding Commission (IGC) flight metadata.

igc:pilot.description: Primary pilot responsible for the flight as recorded in the IGC header.

igc:co_pilot.description: Optional second pilot or instructor associated with the flight.

igc:glider.description: Glider make and model, including competition identifiers when available.

igc:competition_class.description: Competition class for the flight (e.g., Club, 18m) if declared.

igc:takeoff_time.description: Timestamp when the aircraft left the ground, in UTC.

igc:landing_time.description: Timestamp when the aircraft landed, in UTC.

igc:altitude_min_m.description: Minimum recorded altitude in meters above mean sea level.

igc:altitude_max_m.description: Maximum recorded altitude in meters above mean sea level.

igc:altitude_reference.description: Altitude sensor used for min/max calculations.

igc:turnpoints.description: Ordered list of declared task turnpoints.

name.description: Identifier or name of the task turnpoint.

sequence.description: 1-based order of the turnpoint in the task definition.

latitude.description: Latitude of the turnpoint in decimal degrees.

longitude.description: Longitude of the turnpoint in decimal degrees.
